Tomorrow sees a slight improvement to 3 ft @7s SW with fresh 16 mph SSE winds, but it may be a bit choppy. By the day after, expect similar 3 ft @8s WSW swell, with winds easing to 8 mph SSE, making it the best day for a surf session. Best: day after.
